options.label: Other non relative including foster child or foster parent
options.value: Other non relative including foster child or foster parent

content.description: We would now like to ask some questions of each individual.  An adult should answer on behalf of anyone aged 15 or younger.

Please answer your questions first.  Once you have completed your section, you will return to this screen so that the other household members can complete their section.  They can also access it at a later time using the link and unique code given in your letter.  You may answer on behalf of another adult if needed.

questions.description: Your contribution so far has been invaluable. Before you submit your answers, please provide an email address and/or a phone number - you may be re-contacted to take part in future research to help us to improve this service.

questions.title: Thank you, please submit your answers.
questions.description:
Thank you for taking the time to provide your answers to these questions. The information you have provided will be held securely and treated as confidential as directed by the Code of Practice for Official Statistics.

Please submit your responses by using the Submit answers button below. This will lock your questionnaire so that it will not be possible to re-enter the survey.
